count.title: Count
count.description: Instead of created a binary 0/1 mask dataset, create one with counts of voxel overlap, i.e., each voxel will contain the number of masks that it is set in.

datum.title: Datum
datum.description: 'byte' or 'short' or 'float'. Specify data type for output.

dilate_inputs.title: Dilate inputs
dilate_inputs.description: Use this option to dilate and/or erode datasets as they are read. ex. '5 -5' to dilate and erode 5 times.

dilate_results.title: Dilate results
dilate_results.description: Dilate and/or erode combined mask at the given levels.

fill_dirs.title: Fill dirs
fill_dirs.description: Fill holes only in the given directions. this option is for use with -fill holes. should be a single string that specifies 1-3 of the axes using {x,y,z} labels (i.e. dataset axis order), or using the labels in {r,l,a,p,i,s}.

fill_holes.title: Fill holes
fill_holes.description: This option can be used to fill holes in the resulting mask, i.e. after all other processing has been done.

frac.title: Frac
frac.description: When combining masks (across datasets and sub-bricks), use this option to restrict the result to a certain fraction of the set of volumes.
